Genocide in Bangladesh-2013: 

Army Officers to face Serbia-type Trial

In Bangladesh, the unarmed civilians have been suppressed brutally who are vociferous and stand against illegal activities of Sheikh Hasina government in the last five years. It was not only limited to arrest, torture, imprisonment. Even many people have been forcedly taken out from their house and killed. Thousands have been carried off. 

Some lead astray army officers have involved with all of these activities. They were engaged themselves with these activities while they were in deputation in different forces. 

Sheikhnews.com has got some officers list. These officers are only a part of that list. Serbian army officers involved with the massacre in Croatia was confronted to the international court by a team of UN, in the same way an attempt is being taking to bring these officers under judicial trial in the international court for their crimes against humanity.
